title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two-panel huipil, neck and armholes bound with black velvet. Bands of weft patterning nearly cover this huipil with a combination of European-influence floral designs and traditional geometric patterns (possibly rupaj plato or ceremonial plate). Bands of patterns are separated by very narrow separator rows. Patterning is woven in blue, pink, magenta, yellow, green, white.
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Lloyd Olson in memory of Selma Groethe
